name: NWProtocolIP.Options
desc: A container of options for configuring how IP is used on a connection.

items.name: var version: NWProtocolIP.Options.Version
items.desc: A required IP version that disables all other versions for a connection.

items.name: enum NWProtocolIP.Options.Version
items.desc: IP versions to require on connections and listeners.

items.name: var shouldCalculateReceiveTime: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether a connection delivers receive timestamps for IP packets.

items.name: var hopLimit: UInt8
items.desc: The default hop limit for packets a connection generates.

items.name: var useMinimumMTU: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean indicating that the connection uses the minimum MTU value, which is 1280 bytes for IPv6.

items.name: var disableFragmentation: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether fragmentation is disabled on outbound packets.
